text: Motion
Good morning, Producer-san
Motion
Motion
...I look forward to working with you again today
Producer, good morning
Motion

The President called us over,
do you know what's going on?

Hey!
Maybe, we did something wrong!?
Ah, good morning Producer!
Motion
Motion

Good morning everyone
Actually, I was the one who was called here...
Everyone, thank you for your hard work~!
Motion

...Thanks for all your hard work / Good work
/ Good job!
The president is calling you all right here~

[good morning
Is everyone here?]
Yes!

[I wanted to tell you in person about the job,
but I'm out on another errand]

I've given the details to Huzuki, so listen up,
I'm counting on you
That means we have a new job...right?
From what I've heard, that's what it sounds like

...Y-Yes
...A new job, directly from the President....

Now, let me tell you about the job the president
told me about~

For the upcoming audition,
We'd like for illumination STARS to partake in it
Audition!

I see... It's an assignment directly from the president,
we have to be well prepared
...Um, Producer-san...?

Oh, right
Let's ask Hazuki-san for more details and discuss it with her
